Package entropy.view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Rule
    An interface to specify some constraints related to the final state of the vms and pms.
    SearchGoal
    Describes an objective variable to reduce.
    SearchHeuristic
    produces heuristics to inject into a ReconfigurationProblem in order to enhance its solving process.
    View
    Add informations to a problem.
    ViewAsModule
    A view, seen as a module in a reconfigurationProblem
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PluginDescriptor
    plugin description, configuration parsing and class discovery at compile time.
    ProblemAccess
    A view is given access to the problem through this interface.
    variables are created through the ProblemAccess.variables, while constraints are created through the ProblemAccess.constraints.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Rule.Type
    The possible types for the constraint.
